title: What is the best Spotify playlist you've ever listened to? - Quora

response.answer_text: The "Legendary Guitar Solos" list. Some of their picks are a bit odd in my opinion (Hot For Teacher, Sharp Dressed Man, Europa as opposed to I Love You Much Too Much), but all around good music. Someone of undeniable taste also made a Van Halen playlist containing all 70-something David Lee Roth era songs, and nothing but.
Do they have one that is only NPR news reports?
